original: 오히려 그들조차 시간을 공평치 않게 쓰고 있는 모습이 마음에 들지 않았지. 행동의 이유는, 그것이다.
context:

In fact, I found their hypocrisy detestable. Did you know that even the Yurodiviye did not use their hours equally amongst one another? That is why I have chosen action.
JP :
むしろ彼らすら時間を公平に使っていないことが気に食わなかった。

context:
EN :
Two. I am not 'killing time'. You will not compare my crusade to something so hollow.
JP :
2つ。私はただ時間を殺人する、
意味の無い行動をしているわけではない。

original: 네가 아무리 미친 살인마라 한들… 지금까지의 행동에는 패턴이 있었어. 그게 네 신념이든 무기의 약점이든 간에 내 시간을 죽일 수는 없을 걸.
context:
EN :
Sure, you're the big, scary 'Time Ripper', but I've got ya all figured out. I know your patterns. There's something staying your hand, isn't there? Whether it's your creed, some kind of a design flaw in your tech... you can't touch my time.
JP :
あんたがいくら狂った殺人鬼だとしても…今までの行動にはパターンがあった。
それがあんたの信念だろうが、武器の弱点だろうが

context:

That's when it shall dawn on you, that despair. It'll all come rushing in like a flood; that disparity, the unfamiliarity... of all the time you killed.
JP :
そして殺してしまった時間に対して押し寄せる後悔と

context:
